name: @twokeys/common-hi
description: Encompasses things shared by the GUI and CLI, such as interfaces defining Setup UI, as well as the code for these.
author: Kishan <kishansambhi@hotmail.co.uk>

scripts.test:isolated: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_PROJECT="./tsconfig.test.json" TWOKEYS_NONINTERACTIVE=true mocha test-isolated/**/*.ts --exclude test/**/*.ts
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_PROJECT="./tsconfig.test.json" TWOKEYS_NONINTERACTIVE=true nyc mocha
scripts.coverage:isolated: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_PROJECT="./tsconfig.test.json" TWOKEYS_NONINTERACTIVE=true nyc mocha test-isolated/**/*.ts --exclude test/**/*.ts
